gw.plugin.billing

Class PaymentPreviewItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.plugin.billing.PaymentPreviewItem

  • public class PaymentPreviewItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Data element used to display payment previews.

    The PaymentPreviewItem class provides:

    • The Statement Date as a Date
    • The Due Date as a Date
    • The Type as a String
    • The Amount as a MonetaryAmount
    • The ChargeCategory is a String
